name: Do Not Look At The Moon
name_original: Do Not Look At The Moon
description:
The moon is shining in the night and you feel an unusual urge to gaze at it.

Inspired by the analog horror genre, this game is a tribute to LOCAL58TV Weather Service episode.

Made in a week for the Scream Jam 2021.

Attributions:

Music: https://lightbluepianist.itch.io/
Wall/ground/ceiling textures: https://opengameart.org/content/terrain-textures-pack-from-stunt-rally-23 and https://opengameart.org/content/wall-grass-rock-stone-wood-and-dirt-480
Plant: https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-nature-group
Pot: https://opengameart.org/content/porcoi-pot
Moon and Earth textures: https://www.solarsystemscope.com/textures/
Door sounds: https://opengameart.org/content/door-open-sfx and https://opengameart.org/content/hi-tech-button-sound-pack-i-non-themed
